title: फ़ैक्ट-चेक: न्यूज़ीलैंड की PM ने जन्माष्टमी की शुभकामनाएं दीं और गीता के उपदेश सुनाये?
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Jacinda Kate Laurell Ardern is a New Zealand politician who has served as the 40th prime minister of New Zealand. Please listen to her for what she is telling about Bhagwan Shri Krishna and Bhagavad Gita. Jay Shri Krishna 🙏🙏🌷🌷🙏🙏

Listen to the Prime Minister of New Zealand🙏💐

Namaste, 🙏#Janmashtami is an annual festival in India and believers of Sanatana Dharma world over to celebrate the birth of Lord Krishna, 8th Avatar of God.

Listen to what the honorable Prime Minister of New Zealand Smt. @jacindaardern has to say about Life and Krishna.
